articles.author: Online Bureau, ET HealthWorld
articles.title: Spanish TB vaccine MTBVAC commences clinical trials in India - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: The trials are carried out by Bharat Biotech in close collaboration with Biofabri. Trials to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of MTBVAC have started with a pivotal safety, immunogenicity and efficacy trial planned to start in 2025.
articles.content: Hyderabad: MTBVAC, the Spanish tuberculosis vaccine, the first live attenuated vaccine of Mycobacterium tuberculosis isolated from a human reaches a new milestone by starting clinical trials in India… [+4134 chars]
